video_prompt: Kitten's head subtly cocks, ears twitch, and eyes slowly blink. Its paw playfully bats faint flour dust on the wooden surface. Out-of-focus background light intensifies, then softens, causing bokeh to swirl gently.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** **A soft, inviting full shot of an adorable tabby kitten (Himalayan/British Shorthair type, white/light brown) wearing small, round-rimmed glasses, sitting attentively on a light wooden surface dusted with flour. The kitten has wide, inquisitive eyes, a gentle expression, and alert ears. Fluffy white chest and paws visible, with small toes peeking out. Small, lumpy white dough piece to the right, and a subtle spread of flour in the foreground. Warm sunlight streams in from the blurred background, creating a soft bokeh. Hints of colorful kitchen items (yellow cup, red item) add subtle color. Emphasize cuteness, intelligence, and domestic warmth.**
refined_video_prompt: Kitten's head subtly cocks, ears twitch, and eyes slowly blink. Its paw playfully bats, causing faint dust motes to rise and swirl. Ambient light intensifies, then gently softens, as bokeh blooms and subtly shifts.
